Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic funerary text; vignette, 1 l. of pseudo-hieroglyphic and 11 ll. of demotic (Book of Breathings) on recto, 1 l. of demotic on verso.
Curator's comments: See M Stadler 'Papyri BM EA 10121, 10198, 10415, 10421a-b, 10426a)' in Res severa verum gaudia (Fs Zauzich; Leuven, Peeters 2004), 551-72. Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
Published in S. P. Vleeming, Demotic and Greek-Demotic Mummy Labels and Other Short texts gathered from Many Publications (Studia Demotica 9; Leuven: Peeters), no. 1150.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (54007) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/54007)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fair
